page.title: 03Facilities,Five Roads
page.content: The village needs a hall as a meeting place.Preasure is mounting for tennis courts and better recreational facilities.To date,an area has been leveled in preparation,but further work needs to be done.Parc Elin Mair has been reclaimed from marshland with benches and a cricket square.The village lacks a social focal point.Improvements have been made to the square but elderly locals do not like the high pavements provided.It was suggested that a seat be located on some rough ground on the crossroads but the land owner refused permission. Recently a Brownie Pack has been formed meeting in the local school.Similarly a pre-school playgroup funded by parents meets there.
